mapper.select: SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.course_no AS course_no, c.name AS course_name, t.name AS teacher_name, t.phone AS teacher_phone, t.email AS teacher_email FROM student s JOIN course_selection sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id JOIN course c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId}
